    Global Recycled Standard

    Global Recycled Standards (GRS) products use materials made from at least 50% recycled content. GRS is an international standard that aims to increase the use of recycled materials, ensure good working conditions, and minimize harmful environmental and chemical impacts. Each stage of production is required to be certified by independent third-party certification bodies using annual audits. The GRS is owned by Textile Exchange and all sites are audited by independent third-party certification bodies.

OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100
